article_title: Wilkes & McHugh Law Firm's Departure Highlights Fall in Nursing Home Lawsuits
article_text: The departure of Wilkes & McHugh, known for winning historic, multimillion-dollar verdicts against nursing homes, illustrates the changing economics of nursing home litigation in Arkansas.
